sentences.sContent: The radiation can damage microprocessors and computer memories, causing them to malfunction.
sentences.sCn: 该辐射会破坏微处理器和计算机存储器，使之出故障。

remMethod.val: 词根记忆: mal(坏) + function(功能) → 功能不好 → 故障

trans.tranOther: If a machine or part of the body malfunctions, it fails to work properly
a fault in the way a machine or part of someone’s body works
